hiru ef.em. samanga bandunu suwahasak shrawakayan wenuwen pin sith peradariwa sanwidhana kerena hiru siddhartha gauthama dambaadiwa wandanawa aarambha kerunu athara, dina 12ka kalayak mema pinbara wandana charikawa kriyathmakayi.sama sathiye dinakama hiru ef.em. osse pracharaya wana siddhartha gauthama rediyo natya asuren asana lada prashnayata niwaradi pilithura labadun thawath wasanawantha pirisakuyi mema dambaadiwa wandana charikawa sandaha ekwanne.
mata maga arunu kalayakadi ee kiyanne mama ipadenna kalin ethuma bohoma kriyashiliwa me awihinsawadi wada piliwela kriyathmaka karala thibuna .
